mapper.select: select stu_id, college_id, name from tbl_student where stu_id=#{stuId} and password=#{password}

select a.award_id as awardId, a.award_total_name as awardName, a.introduce as introduce, a.limit_number as limitNum, c.award_big_type_name as type, a.teac_name as teacName, b.award_state_name as awardStateName, b.award_state_id as awardStateId, if(a.award_id in ( select b.award_id from tbl_stu_award as b where b.stu_id = #{stuId} ), 1, 0) as isApplied from (tbl_award as a left join tbl_award_big_type as c on a.award_big_type_id = c.award_big_type_id) left join tbl_award_state as b on a.award_state_id = b.award_state_id where a.award_state_id = 2
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_stu_award(stu_id, stu_name, award_id, award_total_name, reason, apply_time) values (#{stuId}, #{realName}, #{awardId}, #{awardName}, #{reason}, #{applyTime})
mapper.select: select a.stu_id as stuId, a.stu_name as stuName, a.award_total_name as awardName, a.apply_time as applyTime, a.teac_name as teacTime, a.reason as reason, b.check_result_name as checkResult, a.check_time as checkTime from tbl_stu_award as a left join check_result as b on a.check_result_id = b.check_result_id where a.stu_id = #{stuId} order by a.apply_time desc
